component.name: default
component.detailedDescription:
ALTIBASE HDB Client
ALTIBASE HDB Client modile

infoParameter.name: diagnostic_warning
infoParameter.title: Warning
infoParameter.value:
Warning :
This is a special diagnostic package intended only for use in tracking problems or for other special purposes.
Because this package is not officially supported, do not use it for extended periods or in production environments.

directoryParameter.name: installdir
directoryParameter.explanation: Please specify the installation directory for ALTIBASE HDB Client ${altibase_base_version}.${altibase_tagset_version}.${altibase_tag_version}

if.explanation: select Fullpkg page or patchpkg page

showWarning.text:
The ALTIBASE HDB ${altibase_base_version} client has already been installed for use by all users of this computer.
At this time, it is only possible to patch the existing installation.
In order to perform a full ALTIBASE HDB installation, it is first necessary to uninstall the previously installed ALTIBASE HDB ${altibase_base_version} client.

The ALTIBASE HDB Client package cannot be installed in ${installdir} because a previous version is already installed in the same location.
Please uninstall the previous version of the ALTIBASE HDB Client and try again.
The ALTIBASE HDB patch upgrade wizard cannot proceed, because ALTIBASE HDB is not installed. Please install ALTIBASE HDB before attempting to upgrade it.

infoParameter.name: show
infoParameter.title: Patch Upgrade - Patch-${altibase_patch_version}

choiceParameter.name: install_scope
choiceParameter.title: Installation scope
choiceParameter.explanation: Do you want to install ALTIBASE HDB for the current user, or for all users of this computer?

choiceParameter.name: odbc_setup
choiceParameter.title: ODBC Setup${altibase_dist_type}
choiceParameter.explanation: Do you want to install the ALTIBASE HDB ODBC driver? The ODBC driver will be available for use by all users, even if you install ALTIBASE HDB only for the current user.

showQuestion.text: The ALTIBASE HDB ODBC driver has already been installed. Would you like to overwrite the previously installed driver?
